definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: That's the sort of question that Su Zishun and his dorm-mates chat about before going to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 这是苏志顺和他的室友们在“卧谈会”上的一个论题。

sentences.english: A gelatinous substance in seaweed is used to make ice cream smooth and creamy.
sentences.chinese: 海藻中的胶质被用来使冰淇淋滑顺和乳化。

sentences.english: Shun Wo Company was established in Hong Kong in 1991.
sentences.chinese: 顺和实业公司1991年成立于香港。

sentences.english: That's the sort of answer that Su Zishun and his dorm-mates conversation about ahead going to slumber.
sentences.chinese: 这是苏志顺和他的室友们在“卧谈会”上的一个论题。

sentences.english: The prefixes cis and trans are frequently applied to disubstituted cycloalkanes.
sentences.chinese: 词头顺和反常用于双取代的环烷烃。
